TopicTitle: Other View Modes are Inheriting the Capture Modes Camera Speed Settings.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

How to Replicate In Space:

Spoiler
  1. Load Craft
  2. Go to Capture Mode
  3. For a moment hold down Numpad * (or Numpad / if you want the camera movement to completely freeze)
  4. Test new rotational speed
  5. Rotate the camera around the craft while tapping between camera views with the V Key.
  6. When getting to the Chase View stay there for a few moments while still rotating around the craft because it appears to freeze and then become responsive.

Note the following View Mode's speed are the same as Capture Mode:

  • Chase

How to Replicate On Land:

Spoiler
  1. Launch Craft
  2. Go to Capture Mode
  3. For a moment hold down Numpad * (or Numpad / if you want the camera movement to completely freeze)
  4. Test new rotational speed
  5. Rotate the camera around the craft while tapping between camera views with the V Key. Chase View will pause for a moment as before.

Note the following View Mode's speed are the same as Capture Mode:

  • Chase
  • Horizon
  • Body
